name: True Hentai Puzzle
description:
"True Hentai Puzzle" is a sliding puzzle that consists of a frame of square tiles in random order with one tile missing. The object of the puzzle is to place the tiles in order by making sliding moves that use the empty space.
Put pieces together in a logical way in order to arrive at the correct solution of the puzzle."True Hentai puzzle" is a logical game featuring:
  • True nice artwork
  • Gallery with pictures from the completed levels.
  • Good music (14 wonderful, soothing ambient)

  • Dynamic backgrounds (with the ability to control animation)
  • Tips in the form of puzzle pieces numbering (can be turned on and off)
  • Two modes of 3x3 (for beginners) and 5x5 (for real pros)
  • A large number of levels (42)
  • Leaderboard
  • 666 Achievements
Future:
  • Trade Cards
